price: Ubwo yari kuri Sidrat-il-Muntaha (Igiti cya nyuma),[1]
footnotes: [1] Sidratil-Mun’tahaa: Ni igiti kiri hafi ya Ar’shi, cyiswe igiti cya nyuma kuko nta kiremwa na kimwe kikirenga.

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.
